dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement (http://hosting.kwm.ru)
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern
Dear Sirs,

We at Artvertex, Inc. have come to be aware that you or your customers are hosting a
website that is a copyright infringement of our website Template Monster content at
the address http://www.templatemonster.com
The website in question is http://hosting.kwm.ru. We have the evidence that this
site illegally distributes our products without being assigned ANY copyright
license.
http://hosting.kwm.ru/~kexitru/template_sup_6055.zip
Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2003 Artvertex,
Inc." The presence of this material on your server is illegal.
Website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or medium and
is therefore making you posses illegal material.
US copyright laws protect all parts of this material. 
The owner of this website has been notified of his actions, and has been told the
consequences. If the site is not removed from your servers within the next 10 days
our Copyright attorney will file a civil lawsuit in federal court against both you
and the owner of the site.
I strongly urge you to delete the hosting account for http://hosting.kwm.ru within
those 10 days, before this action is taken. This site is attempting to profit from
our material and therefore the U.S. attorneys can get involved.
If ALL of this material is removed within 10 days then no action will be taken
against you or the site owner, and neither will be convicted of a federal crime.
Please remove the account as soon as you receive this if possible.
-- 
Best regards,
Anthony Bradshaw
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
22 Jordan Road
NY, Troy, 12180
Tel:  19174770238 (12 A.M.- 08 A.M. EST)
Fax:  15092758568
ICQ:  267444932
AIM:  tonbradshaw
mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com
